## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G12990](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G12990)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RRP45a</u>
- **Gene Name:** ribonuclease PH45A
- **Description:**   ribonuclease PH45A;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2089215
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

   - [GO:0000177](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0000177)&nbsp;---&nbsp;part of&nbsp;---&nbsp;cytoplasmic exosome (RNase complex)

   - [GO:0034473](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0034473)&nbsp;---&nbsp;involved in&nbsp;---&nbsp;U1 snRNA 3-end processing

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [cer7-3 Atrrp45a]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The double mutant is gametophytic lethal for both female and male gametophytes.
## Literature:
